rules_text:
Choose two –
• Jund Command deals 3 damage to each non-Dragon creature.
• Jund Command deals 4 damage to each opponent.
• Each opponent sacrifices a planeswalker.
• Mill five cards. Return a permanent card milled this way to your hand.
notes:
• Jund Command deals 3 damage to each non-Dragon creature.
• Jund Command deals 4 damage to each opponent.
• Destroy target planeswalker.
• Mill five cards. Put a permanent card from among the milled cards into your hand.
